plot: While on a business trip to Los Angeles, Koji visits his childhood friend Tomo whom he has not met for ages. On that afternoon, they chat over tea and cigarettes.
title: Tea & Cigarettes
plot_es: While on a business trip to Los Angeles, Koji visits his childhood friend Tomo whom he has not met for ages. On that afternoon, they chat over tea and cigarettes.
plot_en: While on a business trip to Los Angeles, Koji visits his childhood friend Tomo whom he has not met for ages. On that afternoon, they chat over tea and cigarettes.
